channel.title: [PI] Help!
channel.description: My summoning orb and construction, summoning, hunter, and dungeoneering skills ONLY appear when I seem to die in game. Is there any way to fix this?

item.title: [PI] Help!
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“Code kai, post:3, topic:443781”]Ok, I’ll give a detailed description.

Let’s say I login. All of the skills EXCEPT Construction, Hunter, Summoning, and Dungeoneering have the skill level next to them saying (level)/99 like 1/99. Also, the summoning orb is invisible too at this point.

Then, let’s say, I went to godwars and died. The moment I die, the construction, hunter, summoning, and dungeoneering skills ALL have skill levels next to them and plus, the summoning orb reappears!

I hope that helped. Thanks for everything![/quote]

I can help you about the Summoning orb…
Make sure you used the Real Object it

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help!
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

Ok, I’ll give a detailed description.

Let’s say I login. All of the skills EXCEPT Construction, Hunter, Summoning, and Dungeoneering have the skill level next to them saying (level)/99 like 1/99. Also, the summoning orb is invisible too at this point.

Then, let’s say, I went to godwars and died. The moment I die, the construction, hunter, summoning, and dungeoneering skills ALL have skill levels next to them and plus, the summoning orb reappears!

I hope that helped. Thanks for everything!

Read full topic

item.description:

So like when you die they appear in the skill tab? Can you give a bigger discreption or show a video or media of the problem.
